remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is internally created and used by the page parser when parsing a `<mobile:ObjectList>` element. The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListControlBuilder> class recognizes statically declared `<Field>` elements and statically declared `<Command>` elements.
